object4d

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • object4d.Point

  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a point in the 4 dimensional-hyperspace.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Point()
      Initializes the point with values as 0 and color as black.
      Point(Point point)
      Initializes the point with values and color of another point.
      Point(Vector4D values, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, boolean selectable)
      Initializes the point with values, color and if it's selectable.

        h - height of canvas

        public Point rotateByVector(Vector4D axis,
                            double angle)
        Rotates a point around an custom axis for a certain angle.
        Parameters:
        axis - axis to be rotated around
        angle - angle in radiant's to be rotated
